name: Fracture
description: Break into two or more pieces along a weak point.
design_insight: Visible division without complete separation, highlighting structural stress points in materials over time.

name: Wrinkle
description: Form small folds or creases due to compression or aging.
design_insight: Wrinkling adds texture, evoking a sense of use or material fatigue, useful for organic or worn aesthetics.

name: Unravel
description: Come apart into threads or fibers through wear or stress.
design_insight: Breaks materials down into smaller components providing modularity and recycling potential.

name: Fragment
description: Break into smaller, irregular pieces due to impact or brittleness.
design_insight: Fragmentation creates numerous small parts, ideal for designs requiring disintegration or reuse of fragments.

name: Decompose
description: Break down into simpler organic components through microbial activity.
design_insight: Progressive breakdown from a solid state to fragmented forms, allowing for nutrient recycling in natural environments.

name: Dissolve
description: Disintegrate into smaller parts when exposed to a solvent or environmental condition.
design_insight: Complete material breakdown and disappearance without remnants.

name: Shed
description: Lose or remove layers gradually, typically in a gradual and natural process.
design_insight: Revealing new surfaces beneath or underlying materials.

name: Bulge
description: Swell outward due to internal pressure, increase in size or volume.
design_insight: Expansion causes changes in material dimensions, potentially altering the product's shape or fit over time.

name: Shrink
description: Reduce in size due to moisture loss, heat, or chemical reactions.
design_insight: Shrinking creates tighter, denser forms, potentially enhancing material compactness or brittleness.

name: Melt
description: Change from solid to liquid under heat.
design_insight: Melting leads to total form loss, useful in designs that require transition to a fluid state.

name: Crack
description: Develop thin, linear breaks without full separation.
design_insight: A precursor to deeper damage and indicates stress, useful for monitoring material fatigue.

name: Fade
design_insight: Fading reflects exposure to elements, useful in designs where the passage of time or environmental interaction is highlighted.

name: Corrode
description: Deteriorate by chemical action, often resulting in surface weakness.
design_insight: Corrosion creates a rough, discolored appearance, signaling structural weakening over time.

name: Sag
description: Droop or sink due to weight, gravity, or weakened structure.
design_insight: Sagging shows loss of structural integrity, indicating age or insufficient support in materials.

name: Erode
description: Gradually wear away through friction or chemical action.
design_insight: Erosion smooths surfaces over time, resulting in thinner material layers and a polished, worn look.

name: Lean
description: Incline or bend due to structural weakening.
design_insight: Leaning shows material instability, often a sign of imbalance or failing structural integrity.

name: Split
description: Divide into separate parts, often along natural seams or points of stress.
design_insight: Occurs due to material weaknesses or external forces, enabling easier disassembly or repurposing.

name: Pit
description: Develop surface indentations due to wear or corrosion.
design_insight: Pitting adds texture, signifying age and use, useful in designs emphasizing weathered aesthetics.
